name: unsolvable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a problem, difficulty, or mystery is unsolvable, it is not possible to find a solution to it or the cause of it: Without further funds, this is an almost unsolvable problem. Some of the crimes were deemed unsolvable.
More examplesFewer examplesProblems like these can seem unsolvable.Some of his financial problems are virtually unsolvable without drastic action.The situation remains unsolvable.He was called in to solve this seemingly unsolvable mystery. He was famous for solving unsolvable crimes.His life was a mystery that was both intriguing and unsolvable.
